info.name: Patreon Dark Mode
info.description: a dark theme for Patreon that is actively worked on (Includes customizable colors for buttons and more!)
info.additionalInfo:
Update: 02/01/2020
------------------------------------------
Hey Guys long time no see as you have prob seen the theme is heavily broken im going to be fixing the theme by rewriting it from scratch! i dont have an estimate on when it will be done but do keep an eye out for it! :D


Update: 12/23/2018
------------------------------------------
Sorry guys for no update in awhile i am currently busy with life so this wont be updated for awhile i don't know when i can come back to this so sorry in advance everyone just be patient with me.

Update: 1.4.6
------------------------------------------
Fixed load more button

Update: 1.4.5
------------------------------------------
ok as of 11/7/18 i think i fixed all the broken stuff Patreon kept updating classes every 5 mins hopefully it stopped

Update: 1.4.4
------------------------------------------
As of 11/6/18 6:47 PM EST i fixed all the broken elements decided to go ahead and fix it again today enjoy the theme guys!

For Gods sake right when i release a patch they break a lot of stuff again ill get onto it tomorrow guys sorry

Update: 1.4.3
------------------------------------------
Fixed all elements that got broken on 11/5/18

Update: progress on fixes are doing great already fixed home page, creators page, messages, search page, and find creators you can currently apply this fix now as i added it im almost done with all the fixes thanks for waiting guys!

(as some of you may have seen as of 11/5/18 Patreon broke a lot of my theme i am currently working on a fix but will require a bit of time so please be patient)

Update: 1.4.2
------------------------------------------
Fixed user popout

added changeable color for message received icon
